title: Brief Answers to the Big Questions
author: Stephen Hawking
description: In his post-mortem book, Stehpen Hawking addresses ten difficult questions from 'Is There a God?' up to 'How do we shape the Future?'. Though questions and tougher answers.
recommendetFor: His enthusiasm about science and solving humanity's biggest problem is clearly astonishing and therefore a must-read for every science person out here.
